title: 怎么用指令clear指定删除带附加值的物品
author: xiaoliangdada77
txt_content:
本帖最后由 xiaoliangdada77 于 2020-1-14 21:29 编辑 

怎么用指令clear指定删除带附加值的物品
例如用clear删除河豚

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
xiaoliangdada77 发表于 2020-1-14 21:31
1.12.2
/clear @a minecraft:fish 3 

若无效，尝试
/minecraft:clear @a minecraft:fish 3

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
海豚并不是物品啊，如果你是说海豚刷怪蛋的话。

/clear @a dolphin_spawn_egg

replies.author: xiaoliangdada77
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-14 21:27
海豚并不是物品啊，如果你是说海豚刷怪蛋的话。

/clear @a dolphin_spawn_egg
河河.....豚豚

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
xiaoliangdada77 发表于 2020-1-14 21:29
河河.....豚豚
游戏版本？
